title: Autocompounding and simplifying fee structure
body:
As we are the king of automation strategies our pending ACS should autocompound too! 
What needs to be done? 
***Move earned ACS from farms to ACS vault directly!***
What does it solve? 
10 ACS Transaction Fee can be removed. No Fees for deposits. Still 10% fee for withdraw. APY shows correctly. Genius.
author: 0x592896a49e254d4cc557a02C1413f1cF9B130f95
